alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 10:17AM CDT until June 18 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN JASPER AND SOUTHERN NEWTON COUNTIES... At 1017 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Garlandville, or near Newton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Hickory around 1025 AM CDT. Chunky and Rose Hill around 1030 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
